metadata.title: CVE-2019-9453 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Android kernel in F2FS touch driver there is a possible out ofbounds read due to improper input validation. This could lead to localinformation disclosure with system execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
